title: [PERF] Optimize 947KB messageFormatter bundle
body:
## Problem
messageFormatter bundle is 947KB, accounting for ~40% of total bundle size.

## Impact
- Slow initial page load
- Poor mobile performance
- High bandwidth usage

## Tasks
- [ ] Analyze bundle with webpack-bundle-analyzer
- [ ] Implement code splitting for formatter
- [ ] Lazy load heavy dependencies
- [ ] Consider lighter alternatives
- [ ] Add bundle size budgets

## Acceptance Criteria
- Bundle size < 300KB
- Maintains all functionality
- Performance metrics improved
- Bundle size CI checks added

## Priority: HIGH
## Effort: 8 story points
